content: Great article! Im sure you can understand my shock when I read that you were in the sixth grade a few years ago, lol. I agree with your thoughts on Material Design. I’ve followed its specs to a T on some projects but like you said, throw in your own personality and thats where great apps will stand out. You’re doing a great job at asking questions and continuing to grow in your craft. Dont stop doing what you’re doing, stay awesome and slay some dragons :D Lets do that dribbble thing, https://dribbble.com/kaseyrandall
